description: This is a light, chocolate sandwich cake and sometimes only chocolate cake will do - especially at party time.
name: Chocolate Sandwich Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make sure the cakes are cool before putting on the topping. Put one cake on a serving plate and spread one-quarter of the topping over it. Put the other cake on top and spread the rest of the topping over the top and sides until the cake is evenly coated. Leave to set.
